challenger.step1Desc: Browse challenges by location, difficulty, and prize pool. Find your perfect thrill.
challenger.step2Desc: Reserve your spot and show up ready to dominate. Bring your A-game.
challenger.step3Desc: Claim your prizes and share your victory. Build your reputation as a champion.

vendor.step1Desc: Register your business and set up your challenge offerings in minutes.
vendor.step2Desc: Welcome Gen Z challengers, host epic events, and boost your brand visibility.
vendor.step3Desc: Attract new customers, fill your venue, and earn extra revenue over bookings made + customers spendings.

ambassador.step1Desc: Submit your application and join our exclusive ambassador community.
ambassador.step2Desc: Share challenges, inspire your audience, and help us grow the movement.
ambassador.step3Desc: Earn rewards, gain recognition, and unlock special perks as a top ambassador.

heroCarousel.ambassadorHeadline: Are you an influencer? Inspire & Sponsor epic Challenges and earn with us.
heroCarousel.ambassadorSubhead: Are you an influencer? Partner with us to sponsor and promote epic challenges.

reasons.title: No More FOMO
reasons.desc: Never miss out on the hottest challenges in your city. Be first to know, first to compete.

reasons.title: Digital Bragging Rights
reasons.desc: Share your wins across all platforms. Build your personal brand as a champion.

reasons.title: Connect & Conquer
reasons.desc: Meet like-minded thrill-seekers. Form teams, make friends, create memories.

reasons.title: Win Real Prizes
reasons.desc: Cash, gadgets, experiences, and exclusive merchandise. Every challenge has rewards.

benefits.title: Competition
benefits.desc: Push your limits and discover what you're truly capable of achieving based on ur own interest.

benefits.title: Connection
benefits.desc: Build lasting friendships with people who share your passion for adventure.

benefits.title: Rewards
benefits.desc: win prizes, discounts, and exclusive access to premium challenges.

benefits.title: Memories
benefits.desc: Create unforgettable experiences that you'll be talking about for years.

about.heroTitle: The Gen Z Team Behind The Challenger
about.heroText: ChallenZee is a challenge-based platform designed for Gen Z by Gen Z. We connect people through fun, social, and competitive experiences hosted at local venues like bars, caf√©s, rooftops, and cultural spaces.
about.missionText: To empower young people to turn every experience into a challenge worth sharing, fostering creativity, connection, and growth across the globe.
about.heroQuote: ‚Äú Great things are done by a series of small things brought together. ‚Äù
